## Discussion

A write to an ordinary file, the creation of a directory or symbolic link, or the creation of a directory entry failed because there aren’t any available disk blocks on the file system, or the allocation of an inode for a newly created file failed because there aren’t any inodes available on the file system.

The corresponding C error is `ENOSPC`.

# noSpace

**Type Property**

Device out of space.

## Declaration

```swift
static var noSpace: Errno { get }
```

## Discussion

A write to an ordinary file, the creation of a directory or symbolic link, or the creation of a directory entry failed because there aren’t any available disk blocks on the file system, or the allocation of an inode for a newly created file failed because there aren’t any inodes available on the file system.

The corresponding C error is `ENOSPC`.

## File System Errors

- **badFileTypeOrFormat**: Inappropriate file type or format.
- **directoryNotEmpty**: Directory not empty.
- **diskQuotaExceeded**: Disk quota exceeded.
- **readOnlyFileSystem**: Read-only file system.
- **tooManyLinks**: Too many links.
- **tooManyOpenFilesInSystem**: The system has too many open files.
- **tooManyOpenFiles**: This process has too many open files.

items.description: The system has too many open files.
